translations: n．痛苦，苦难：身体或精神上的痛苦、困扰或痛苦的原因。
· He has suffered many afflictions in his life.
他一生中遭受了许多苦难。

phrs.translation: 常见魔法病痛, 一般魔法疾病与疼痛

sentences.sentence: Lord, remember David, and all his afflictions.
sentences.translation: (上行之诗)耶和华阿，求你记念大卫所受的一切苦难。

sentences.sentence: What are the supposed “afflictions” of liberty in America?
sentences.translation: 在美国，自由所带来的所谓“痛苦”指的是什么？

sentences.sentence: Some may say that this, too, is one of the “afflictions of liberty”.
sentences.translation: 有人可能要说，这也是“自由带来的痛苦”之一。
